org.eclipselabs.mongoemf

Interface EObjectBuilderFactory


  • public interface EObjectBuilderFactory
    This interface provides the API for for the EObjectBuilder factory. If you wish to use a custom EObjectBuilder, you must create a factory class for your builder that implements this interface.
    Author:
    bhunt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EObjectBuilder createObjectBuilder(ConverterService converterService, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.XMLResource.URIHandler uriHandler, boolean includeAttributesForProxyReferences, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass> eClassCache)
      Constructs an EObjectBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • createObjectBuilder

        EObjectBuilder createObjectBuilder(ConverterService converterService,
                                 org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.XMLResource.URIHandler uriHandler,
                                 boolean includeAttributesForProxyReferences,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass> eClassCache)
        Constructs an EObjectBuilder
        Parameters:
        converterService - the converter service to use for converting non-native values
        uriHandler - the uri handler to use for creating relative URIs
        includeAttributesForProxyReferences - true indicate that attribute values must be included on proxy references; false otherwise
        eClassCache - the optional EClass cache to use - may be null
        Returns:
        the EObject builder
